fields.description:
As a buyer, I would like a switch for "Automated Recommendation," so I do not receive alert emails anymore. 

 

*Here are the use cases:* 

If the user clicks the unsubscribe link in the footer of the email (no matter if the user login/not login/registered/not registered)
 * we will automatically turn off the alert for the user from the backend after the user clicks the link.
 * we will not sign up the user for another automated recommendation for the next 10 month, unless the user turn the automated recommendation on again from the My Alert page.  
 * the user will land to a SRP page with the same "subscription" criteria. 
 * on the top of the page, there will be a message saying " You have been successfully unsubscribed from the recommendation alert. If you want to turn it on again, please go to My Alert page."  +Translation+: "Te has dado de baja exitosamente de nuestra alertas con recomendaciones. Si quieres suscribirte otra vez, por favor ve a la sección Mis Alertas." Message look design please see the attachment of Gumtree example.

comments.body: [~homer] Still discuss with Quentin whether keep a line of text to update the user "all changes have been saved" ever time after the user switch the on/off.

[~homer] Do we have one toggle for all automated recommendations, or one toggle for each automated recommendations?
If it's the former, what will happen if user toggles off, reply to an ad, and then toggle on, will he receive automated recommendations for the ad he replied between toggle off and on?

[~spliu], Hi Spark, thank you for following up on the project. [~homer]

We have one toggle for all automated recommendations. Every time the user replies to something new, the new criteria will replace the old ones. Once the user turns off the toggle, the user will not be re-subscribed to this recommendation email, even if when they reply to something else again. When the user turns on the toggle, the auto-recommendation email will start sending again. Please let me know if this answers your questions.

Design attached:

ZA, SG, IE, PL: zpl.io/2jkprEm

AR: zpl.io/aNBEGdv
MX: zpl.io/aNBEGLZ

[~john] Thanks for your info. When user turns on the toggle, and he replied several ads during the toggle off, Email on what auto-recommendation will "start sending again"? The one when he toggled off, or the last replied one during the toggle off?

As soon as the users toggles back ON, then all his recommendations come back alive assuming they have are still in the 2 weeks period we have in the system.

We have one toggle for all "auto recommendations."
Please change [Ad Title] under the Automated Recommendation section to "Product Recommendation Email“ (without quotation mark) [~leiychen]
Won't fix , move it into ULIVZ-38690 and ULIVZ-38691

items.fromString:
Create a separate section on My Alert page to allow users to manage the subscription of Trigger emails. 

 
 # Allow users to turn on and off of the trigger email
 # Have a "Save changes" button to save all of the changes user made.
items.toString:
As a buyer, I would like a switch for "Automated Recommendation," so I do not receive alert emails anymore. 

 

Create a separate section on My Alert page to allow users to manage the subscription of "Automated Recommendations" 
 # Allow users to turn on and off of the trigger email
 # Have a "Save changes" button to save all of the changes user made or have automatic saves

items.toString:
As a buyer, I would like a switch for "Automated Recommendation," so I do not receive alert emails anymore. 

Create a separate section on My Alert page to allow users to manage the subscription of "Automated Recommendations"

 Design: Basic modifications of 1.0 page –

# A switch at the bottom that turns off notifications from alert email
 # The preference is respected going forward until a user unselect it
 # It goes after all other alerts
 # Have a "Save changes" button to save all of the changes user made or have automatic saves

 # Have a "Save changes" button to save all of the changes user made or have automatic saves [may be not needed if changes are real time?]
